## Bundle type

Represents a Bundle which is used to group Repository Local Objects for Release Management purposes.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export type Bundle = VirtualFolder & {
    Items?: Array<Link>;
};
```

**References:** [VirtualFolder](./open-api-client.virtualfolder.md)<!-- -->, [Link](./open-api-client.link.md)
